name: Shin AI Talking Simulator
description:
CONTENT WARNING:

loud sound (may occur)

sound of a heartbeat

description of being watched/stalked

This game doesn't contain any jumpscares, gore, nor any other dark topics, but we're putting the "horror" tag just in case.

It is what it is;

Just a regular, normal Shin AI talk sim. Absolutely nothing bad can happen.

This fangame is based on Kimi Ga Shine (Your Turn to Die).  All the characters and lore belong to their respective owner, @nannkizum on twitter.  

This is a collab project between @letsdrawkittens/@DepressionHole, who did the programming; and @wetmango69, who did the visuals.
